name: Candle Cave Rave
description:
Press Space to Rave.

Press A and D to Boom and Kaah respectively.

Music made by a friend for the scene. Created using an Arpeggiator set to play notes randomly, and LFOs set to different rates where the beats don't match to modulate the sound forever. Basically the music is also semi randomly generated.

Rave on!

WIP Notice: Planning to update the soundtrack and add more features to the scene to add more random generation elements and interactivity:

  • Prop generation in the scene.
  • Put out and light the candles with custom VFX. (still relearning ribbon FX)
  • Add new colour palettes and more focused randomisation to the colours generated to create dynamic palettes.
